timeline.author: m-g-sonar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,8 +2,8 @@ AutoCloseable, needs to be closed after use. Further, that close call must be made in a finally block otherwise an exception could keep the call from being made. Preferably, when class implements AutoCloseable, resource should be created using "try-with-resources" pattern and will be closed automatically.

-

Failure to properly close resources will result in a resource leak which could bring first the application and then perhaps the box it's on to -their knees.

+

Failure to properly close resources will result in a resource leak which could bring first the application and then perhaps the box the application
